adopted: You were not raised by your birth family, but taken in by another family.
parentDiedInWarfare: Your father was killed in battle.
Your mother was killed in battle.
parentsDiedInWarfare: Your parents were killed in battle.
parentDiedInAnAccident: Your father fell down a well and broke his neck.
Your mother lit a cigarette near a gas leak and was vaporized.
parentsDiedInAnAccident: Your parents were trampled by a stampede of bloodthirsty guinea pigs.
parentMurdered: Your father lost his life in a senseless act of violence.
Your mother was killed in a mugging gone wrong.
parentsMurdered: Your parents were murdered in their sleep.
parentDontRememberYou: Your mother suffered a head injury and does not know who you are.
Your father suffered a head injury and does not know who you are.
parentsDontRememberYou: Your parents were brainwashed by a cult and have no memory of your birth.
neverKnewParent: You were raised by your mom. You never knew your dad.
You were raised by your dad. You never knew your mom.
neverKnewParents: You never knew your parents or where you came from.
leftWithRelativesForSafekeeping: Your parents got in over their heads with the wrong people and they left you with some relatives.
putUpForAdoption: Your parents could not care for you and put you up for adoption.
parentsSoldYouForMoney: Your parents were addicts and sold you for their next hit.
streets: You spent your childhood days in the streets with no supervision.
safeCity: You grew up in safe, prosperous part of a city.
onTheRun: You spent your youth on the run from a dangerous gang.
slums: You grew up surrounded by poverty in the city slums.
ruins: You were raised in the ruins of a once great city.
smallTown: As a child, you lived in a small town.
